content.question: Using the image, respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe one important cultural or political function of the structures in the image.Describe one economic, cultural, or social difference between Great Zimbabwe and another African empire in the same period.Explain one way the religious or cultural practices of an African empire or its people changed after 1500.

topic.text: 1.5: The Sudanic Empires: Ghana, Mali, and Songhai

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
